); } //let style = `--grid-rows:${props.selectedEventDetails.hall.total_rows}, --grid-cols:${props.selectedEventDetails.hall.total_columns}`; return (
How many Seats?
Show Date: {props.showDate} Show Time: {props.showTime}

); } export default BookTicket;
